column1: But because of the council's incompetence, which has meant that her rent card is now marked as owing rent, and lacking a deposit, she would be dependent on a somewhat shady mortgage company for the mortgage to buy such a house ( rent cards are the easiest and most common means of checking on the credit - worthiness of a person on a low income ).
